painPoints.title: Is your website a digital desert?
painPoints.content: You know 'content is king', but operational reality overwhelms you. If you identify these symptoms in your business, you need external discipline:

cards.title: Image of Abandonment
cards.description: Entering a blog and seeing the last news is from 2019 generates immediate distrust. It looks like the business has closed.

cards.title: Invisibility on Google
cards.description: You write about what you like, not what your client searches for. Result: Google ignores you and traffic is zero.

cards.title: Analysis Paralysis
cards.description: You waste hours staring at a blank screen thinking 'what do I talk about today?' instead of invoicing.

cards.title: Chronic Inconsistency
cards.description: You start strong in January and quit in February. SEO requires a martial rhythm you can't maintain due to lack of time.

solution.title: Discipline and SEO Strategy
solution.content: We provide the strategy and the hands. You get the traffic. Every month, we publish an optimized article that attacks a real search intent of your client.
